uk.ac.uea.activityprogram.Controllers

Class Settings_Activity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • uk.ac.uea.activityprogram.Controllers.Settings_Activity

  • public class Settings_Activity
extends Activity
    Settings activity which manages the users settings. Allows user to view and update their school, synchronisation interval, vibration and sound for notifications.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Settings_Activity() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void defaultCalendar()
      Reset users calendar of subscribed events to empty.
      void mementoDefaultSettings()
      Reset user settings to default settings 1hr syncinterval, cmp school and sound and vibration set to true;
      void onBackPressed()
      What happens when back button is pressed in android Saves user and events objects and passes it back to previous screen using setResult
      void onClick(View v) 
      protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
      What happens when activity is created -initialise the sound and vibration switches - setting them to the values from the database (true or false) -set listeners to the switches that listen for changes, change the user settings values depending if they are set to true or false -initialise the spinners ( option lists) for synch interval and activity program - use an array adapter to set the spinners to values from an arraylist, and swithc statements to change the values in database once a value is selected
      void onItemSelected(<any> parent, View view, int pos, long id)
      Interface method for selecting spinner items, deals with what happens when spinner is selected overriden inside onCreate by specific spinner
      void onNothingSelected(<any> parent)
      Interface method for spinner, deals with what happens if spinner isnt selected

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        What happens when activity is created -initialise the sound and vibration switches - setting them to the values from the database (true or false) -set listeners to the switches that listen for changes, change the user settings values depending if they are set to true or false -initialise the spinners ( option lists) for synch interval and activity program - use an array adapter to set the spinners to values from an arraylist, and swithc statements to change the values in database once a value is selected
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - the saved instance

      • onItemSelected

        public void onItemSelected(<any> parent,
                           View view,
                           int pos,
                           long id)
        Interface method for selecting spinner items, deals with what happens when spinner is selected overriden inside onCreate by specific spinner
        Parameters:
        parent - the adapter view
        view - the selected view
        pos - position of item
        id - id of item

      • onNothingSelected

        public void onNothingSelected(<any> parent)
        Interface method for spinner, deals with what happens if spinner isnt selected
        Parameters:
        parent - the adapter view

      • onClick

        public void onClick(View v)
        Parameters:
        v - the view

      • mementoDefaultSettings

        public void mementoDefaultSettings()
        Reset user settings to default settings 1hr syncinterval, cmp school and sound and vibration set to true;

      • defaultCalendar

        public void defaultCalendar()
        Reset users calendar of subscribed events to empty.

      • onBackPressed

        public void onBackPressed()
        What happens when back button is pressed in android Saves user and events objects and passes it back to previous screen using setResult
